law.catch_line: The Commission shall include an entry location on a sentencing guidelines worksheet for a court, in ...
law.text: The Commission shall include an entry location on a sentencing guidelines worksheet for a court, in reporting on crimes involving theft and related crimes under Title 7 of the Criminal Law Article or fraud and related crimes under Title 8 of the Criminal Law Article, to report the specific dollar amount, when available, of the economic loss to the victim.
